sentences: In 1996, Gradac accompanied Sejo Sexon and Elvis J. Kurtović, with whom he restarted band Zabranjeno Pušenje, disbanded in the early 1990s.
He sang and performed on two studio albums; Fildžan viška (1997) and Agent tajne sile (1999).
Gradac left Zabranjeno Pušenje in 2000 due to other commitments; he went to complete the Sarajevo Music Academy.
